name: Transporter Drones
description:
Clock against time and drones to deliver your packages!

Game theme:

In a dense city against time, you're tasked to deliver your packages with your own drone while avoiding enemy drones with their sole purpose to destroy you. By completing missions you'll earn rewards which you can use to buy  new and better drones.

Features:

Responsive drone controls

50 Total Missions for you to complete! Unlockable drones for you to unlock!

Shooting mechanics

Controls:

WASD To move

Left, Right Arrow keys to rotate your drone Up and down arrow to move your drone up and down

J to teleport to your active mission

Space to shoot (Shooting works only for combat drones)

MORE INFORMATION
